Description:
A Serenity Bay Property to Treasure
You will super impressed with the bay lifestyle on offer here just a mere 500 meter stroll to either The Dell Beach or The Clifton Springs golf club or bowls club. Immaculate 3 bedroom brick veneer family on a huge 928m2 block is yours for the taking. Large light filled lounge has garden & street views with a gas heater & reverse cycle split system. Spacious master bedroom has bay windows with a snap shot view of the bay, walk in robe & full ensuite. Open plan modern kitchen & dining is very stylish with a glass splash back, stainless steel 5 burner gas cook top & rangehood. Also equipped with another reverse cycle split system, white electric oven & grill, dishwasher, walk in pantry & an abundance of cupboards. Sliding doors off dining lead you out to a great undercover deck perfect to entertain under all year round with more bay glimpses & golf course views. 2 living zone also has french doors, another gas heater & walk in robe perfect to store games, books or dvds. Off the hall we have the very spacious bedrooms 2 & 3 both with walk in robes, backyard & golf course views. Central bathroom has seperate shower & a working spa bath. Oversized double car garage with remote roller doors gives you internal access. Plus an additional large 10x6 meter garage with front & rear roller doors, also double gates for rear access off the reserve. Plenty of green yard to play family cricket or kick a football & if that's not enough, walk out the gate to access a huge reserve. Original owner/builders & on the market for the first time ever. With the boat ramp only a few minutes drive, the award winning Bellarine wineries just down the road and lots of supermarkets, shops, cafes, etc you will love your new home.
Insights: 5 Bogan Street, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
MORE TO VIEW ...A REAL SURPRISE ....GREAT HOME !
With some bay views , 4 beds, 2 bathrooms plus study or second living area this light open plan home has been renovated top to bottom. All the hard work has been done. New kitchen, new bathrooms and laundry, timber floors, paint, quality blinds, front and back entertaining areas with single undercover car storage. Master with large WIR/dressing room and full en-suite, Bed 2 and 3 with BIR, large butlers pantry, dishwasher, walk-in linen/ storage room, low maintenance yards, 8 panel solar system, and a lovely homely feel further compliment 18 Boonderabbi with easy future options to convert the existing layout should you desire. This property on approx 586m2 of land will suit the astute purchaser. YOU WILL NOT DO BETTER THAN 18.
Additional feature/s - Study.

Description:
1 OWNER, METICULOUSLY MAINTAINED, WITH BAY VIEWS.
No. 56 is an absolute delight , an immediate feel of home, light and bright surroundings all contribute to impress . Entrance through to lounge , dining room and adjacent kitchen with bay views . Two bedrooms with BIR'S, central bathroom and laundry. Features include central heating , pantry, ample storage and more. Outdoor decking where you will enjoy the sunsets and Geelong by night. A big workshop and/or Studio allows for work from home or options to suit. This home has been meticulously maintained and is positioned a short walk from the water....a real gem.

Description:
Bountiful Bay Views, Yours Forever
Set up for ease of living across two levels of modern, highly functional design, this four bedroom family home is offering way more than meets the eye. Hugely desired, sunny north orientation connects with priceless aquamarine views, perfectly framing an enviable bayside lifestyle, ready to enjoy.
The lower level accommodates the open plan living, meals and kitchen area, enjoying direct access onto the sunny alfresco deck and patio beyond. Screened by mature Pittosporums providing exceptional privacy, you are able to relax and entertain to your heart's content out here.
A second living space offers flexibility as a teen retreat, media or rumpus room, further reiterating the family focus of the home. The fourth bedroom is afforded privacy on this level, gifting option as a comfortable guest room.
Upstairs, it’s all about those views! A spacious living area steals the show, enjoying access to a sun infused balcony harnessing outlooks across to the You Yangs and Melbourne city lights. Hours will be spent basking in the sun, mesmorised by the calming glitter of the sea and watercraft passing by.
Practical assets include central gas heating, ducted vacuum, automated alarm and reticulated sprinkler system. The double lock up garage boasts extra height and rear roller access, making it perfect for boat or caravan owners.
Enjoy a short walk to the water’s edge, easy distance to the Clifton Springs Golf Club and a plethora of award winning wineries and restaurants on your doorstep. Both Drysdale and Clifton Springs townships are at hand, enabling access to preferred local schools, all medical, retail and practical facilities. This lifestyle will reward you for many years to come, prioritise inspection!
Insights: 50 Coolangatta Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Character, charm, privacy
Hidden away from the street is this charming family home. From the welcoming verandah to the timber lined cathedral ceilings add an ethereal warmth to this property.
The spacious open plan country kitchen, large meals/dining & family area offers ample space to entertain the whole family.
The generous formal lounge could easily be used as a parents retreat or with the external door become a home office.
The master suite is to the front of the home and with a full ensuite.
Three double bedrooms off the central passage at the rear of the home.
A central family bath and laundry.
Large standalone garage with rear roller door access.
Very private and secure property backing on to the linear parkland with rear gate access.

Description:
Luxurious Lifestyle And Vast Views
Majestically poised at the top of a cul-de-sac, this expansive property on 1182sqm (approx.) captures stunning views of Port Phillip Bay and offers a luxuriously opulent lifestyle. With several popular beaches and a golf course in close range, the lifestyle opportunities at this sublime property are immense. Up the timber staircase into the family hub of the home, find yourself mesmerised by the sweeping views extending over Port Phillip Bay all the way to the You Yangs. With the main living area centred on a warming gas log fire, the vast floor-to-ceiling windows frame the views magnificently, creating a truly impressive ambience. Discover contemporary functionality in the kitchen, with induction cooking, stainless steel appliances and stone benchtops. The spacious balcony at the front of the home is complemented by the undercover alfresco area. Taking into account the indoor pool and spa, the combination of space and luxury here is remarkable. Each of the three bedrooms benefit from ocean views. Adding to the convenience, the floorplan here is entirely flexible, with two additional living zones having potential to be used as bedrooms or a home office. In a quiet beachside town, this expansive home represents pure luxury.
Insights: 10 Waterford Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 149 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Clifton Springs Charm!
This delightful entry level property offers great scope for a savvy purchaser with a vision. A custom built 2 bedroom residence offers so much more than its profile would suggest; an adaptable floor plan and rear access present options a plenty.
* A custom build approximately 15 years young on a land holding of 593m2
* Lovely light and bright residence; high ceilings throughout and an antique feature fireplace further enhances the charm and character of this one of kind property
* Keeping in line with the custom build 'feel' is the bathroom complete with an oversized therapeutic spa
* Secure car accomodation is provided by a single remote controlled garage; it's depth provides room enough for a car and work shop 'or' even scope to adapt the floor plan STCA.
* Side vehicle access to a deep rear yard will be highly desirable for the buyer who is finding it difficult sourcing a property to build an accessible shed.
* A full span sheltered alfresco is complete with exposed aggregate concrete providing a lovely space to take in a morning coffee; distant rural views provide a relaxing outlook
* A good old fashioned backyard is complete with a number of productive veggie patches, fruit trees and a rustic looking garden shed
* Well positioned right in the heart of Clifton Springs; the water's edge literally just down the road and the highly regarded Clifton Springs Golf Club only a short walk away.
* A fantastic opportunity to secure a great addition to you investment portfolio, excellent downsize option or hard to beat first home.
Insights: 149 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Crème De La Crème
When only the BEST will do!
A revered and tightly held milieu, arguably one of the most sensational views to be had on the Bellarine Peninsula and a comfortable custom built abode, if you are looking for an impressive "Once in a Lifetime Opportunity" your search ends here!
Take a moment to truly appreciate Mother Nature at her finest literally at the foot of your door, the picturesque You Yang's there for you to enjoy along with all the sunrises, balmy sunsets, storms and the ever changing Bay. You can change the home but your location is forever!
This custom design home has been built by the award winning Luke & Searle third generation builders, with over 60 years' experience you will truly appreciate the craftsmanship and astute design of this home. Comprising 4 bedrooms, a grand master suite with lavish ensuite including floor to ceiling tiles, walk-in double shower with seamless base, shower niche, granite vanity and built-in cabinetry complete with a bidet and walk-in robe. Bedrooms 2 and 3 enjoy walk-in robes whilst bedroom 4 is sizeable and equipped with robe space it doubles as a fantastic study/home office. A powder room and lush main bathroom are adjacent to remaining bedrooms. A full sized laundry including walk-in linen press, extra cabinetry and access to the garage and garden completes the rear of the home. The fore of the home is completely dedicated to family living and entertaining, it encompasses the sensational views from all angles making entertaining a true delight. A galley style designer kitchen overlooking the dining and living enjoys granite benchtops, glass splash back, walk-in pantry, electric cooking and ample cupboards.
Whether you are enjoying a family dinner or reading a book on the couch you have total serenity surrounding you which makes this property so special.
Enjoy an elongated tree lined driveway, low maintenance manicured front and back gardens and a quaint courtyard surrounded by foliage.
Features of the home include alarm system, 1.1KW solar panels, tinted windows at the fore of the home, automatic retractable wind sensor awnings, summer/winter awnings, split system in the lounge, zoned slab heating throughout, built-in Bowers & Wilkins (B&W) speakers throughout, lush window furnishings, character ceilings and walls, disability equipped with handrails etc. 2x 2000L water tanks, double lock up garage with remote access and internal/garden access.
With multiple access points to the beach and the jetty just a stone's throw away this is truly a beautiful part of Clifton Springs to enjoy and definitely an opportunity not to be missed.
Insights: 19 Edgewater Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
A CLASSIC BEAUTY!
This absolutely immaculate 4 bedroom home is going to impress the fussiest of buyers and is an absolute must to inspect. Set on a generous 734m2 allotment with side access for the caravan or boat, there is still plenty of room for the kids to play- or even pop in a pool? Inside the home there are 2 separate living zones with the largest incorporating the open plan kitchen, meals and family rooms with double doors that lead through to a smaller formal lounge. The outdoor living area is also accessed via the family room. All 4 bedrooms are generously sized and have built in robes- ensuite to master. Quality fixtures and fittings throughout the home. Central gas heating, evaporative cooling and split system climate control keep you comfortable all year round. Polished floorboards, ducted vacuum system, gas instant hot water and large double garage with internal access complete this very desirable package. Situated just a short stroll to Drysdale shopping and sporting precinct this property ticks all the boxes. You will have to be quick to make this home your own!
Insights: 28 Barrands Lane, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
THIS BUILDER THOUGHT ABOUT THE COST OF ENERGY
This home has the bones to build on and the potential to be brought into the 21st Century with your imagination. Wookey Builders were one of the instigators of the idea of facing the living areas and kitchen north to encourage bringing in the winter sun and keeping out the summer heat. The floor plan offers the option of zoned living. Formal at the front and casual at the rear. Centralised kitchen meals overlooking the yard. What can this neighbourhood offer you? What do you need to make your life easy and fun? It is all catered for here, primary and high schools, medical centres, shopping complexes for the day to day stuff. Bike trails, sporting clubs, dance groups, golf, bowling to keep you fit and healthy. Restaurants, cafes and wineries to fulfil your inner cravings for good food and drink.
A neighbourhood that is very quiet and peaceful but close to the City of Geelong and only seventy five minutes from Melbourne.
Insights: 8 Pathara Court, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Cosy Cottage Minutes To Clifton Springs Golf Club
Overlooking a lovely private front garden with established trees this 3 bedroom home in quiet Clifton Springs has a sunny aspect and is located close to transport with the stunning Clifton Springs Golf Course situated at the end of the street.
An efficient coonara style wood fireplace is a feature of the living room that has large windows to the garden and glimpses of the bay. Well laid out with large pantry cupboards, tiled splashback and stainless steel cooking appliances, the kitchen has good bench space and adjoins the dining area that has sliding doors to the garden. This home offers easy coastal living with a chance to update or simply enjoy and focus on improving your golf game.
Attractive hardwood floorboards run throughout this home and the 3 bedrooms have BIR and enjoy pleasant views to the back garden and side established plantings. There is a neat bathroom with corner spa and separate toilet. The laundry has access to the back garden where there is a paved entertaining space, shaded by trees. A corner wood shed sits at the back of a generous DLUG and the sealed driveway has added room for parking.
A short work to The Dell and bay, bus stop and golf club, this is an ideal opportunity for investors, downsizers or developers keen to realise potential in Clifton Springs (STCA). Don’t miss this cosy home the a quiet Bellarine enclave.
Insights: 8 Bunganowee Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
Views of Corio Bay and the You Yangs
An exciting opportunity has risen to wake up to outstanding 180 views of Corio Bay and the You Yangs. This perfectly proportioned 589 sqm allotment is awaits your creative flair, amazing ideas and is an ideal place to call home.
With views of the bay and beyond, here's the opportunity to build and design a home to take a advantage of the view. Located within minutes of the Drysdale shopping precinct, local schools and within walking distance to the beach, the golf club and the Clifton Springs Boat Harbour. The block is undulated enabling you to build your dream home with commanding views of Geelong and across Corio Bay. Block size 589 sqm.
Close to Clifton Springs Primary School, boat ramp, golf & bowls clubs.
Insights: 54 Bunganowee Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018.

Description:
Something To Delight Every Family Member!
Showcasing an outdoor bungalow and enticing swimming pool, this home has something to delight every family member!
Nestled behind a white picket fence in a quiet pocket of Clifton Springs, a carefree lifestyle is part of the package. Your weekends will be filled with outdoor adventures with the Clifton Springs Golf Course, boat ramp, and open parklands a heartbeat away. The bustling hub of Drysdale shops, cafes, and restaurants within easy reach, while public transport is a short stroll from your front door. Growing families will be spoilt for choice with Clifton Springs Pre-School, Clifton Springs Primary School, and Drysdale Primary School close by.
Timber floorboards and raked ceilings enrich the interiors, which perfectly blend contemporary updates with the home’s original character. With a verandah surrounding the house, a lovely indoor-outdoor flow is created.
The open plan living zone features an open fireplace, while the kitchen makes a stylish statement with timber waterfall benchtops, white cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. A built-in pantry creates ample storage.
The Master Bedroom boasts a walk-in robe, which leads to the en suite with shower. Two additional bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom, laundry, and separate toilet complete the layout. Ducted heating, air conditioning, and ceiling fans provide modern comfort.
With a backyard like this, entertaining is a must! The pool zone will have you yearning for fun-filled summer days at home, while the versatile bungalow (complete with air conditioner and sink) opens onto the sun-drenched alfresco for year-round entertainment. Or why not use the bungalow as a teenage retreat, artist's studio, or even another bedroom?
The long driveway and oversized single lock-up garage, complete with storage and powder room, provide ample off-street parking.
Inspection ASAP!
Insights: 14 Panpandi Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 100 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
First Home or Holiday House?
If Gardens are your forte, then you are going to love this homely 3 bedroom brick & cedar property. Undulating landscaped gardens at the front with decked platform steps, lead you up to the inviting entrance. A spacious lounge awaits you with gas heating & great yard views. This flows onto open plan dining & kitchen which features air conditioning, stainless steel gas stove plus range hood. The central bathroom has separate bath & shower. 3 large bedrooms all have built in robes. Out the back you have very well established, low maintenance & tranquil gardens perfect to read a magazine, enjoy a cheese platter or even a glass of wine. I must add no mowing required here. A garage which is currently set up as a man cave & also a fernery that runs along the side of the house. Public transport is right at your door stop with school & public bus stops on both sides of the road. Not to mention everything Clifton Springs has to offer just minutes away with the bay, boat ramp, cliff top walks, golf clubs, cafes, schools, medical facilities & award winning wineries, you will love the lifestyle here on an approximately 613m2 block.
Insights: 100 Beacon Point Road, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Description:
FANTASTIC BELLARINE LIFESTYLE PROPERTY
If you have been looking for a fantastic family home amongst the Bellarine leisure destinations, then look no more. This renovated 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home on 779m2 will tick the boxes. Perfectly located within an easy stroll to the Golf Club, Bowling Club, coastal reserves and boat ramp. For those with young families, the Primary school and local shopping is also a short walk away. Not to further afield you will find wonderful wineries and eateries and just 15 minutes to the surf.
The home has been delightfully renovated with freshly painted walls, flooring and window coverings. The updated kitchen is fitted with stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar and looks out over the backyard. An open fire in the lounge provides both warmth and character to the area which also opens onto a private side yard.
The Family room is both spacious and bright with natural light. Both the main bathroom and ensuite are spacious and complete with high quality fittings. Running down both the front and back of the home is a verandah providing a substantial under cover space. The North facing back yard is both private, secure and with lush lawns and garden beds. The front yard features drive through access, carport and new fencing with plenty of space for the boat or van.
With the Clifton Springs market being so strong you will need to be quick to secure this property.
Insights: 5 Kiama Way, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 111 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Country Club Delight
Secluded & private 3 bedroom family home on a 611m2 corner block. Very well presented you will feel right at home as you open the front gate. Greeted by lavish lawns, low maintenance landscaped gardens & an enormous deck as you step up to your new front door. Inside polished floor boards with open plan light filled living. Kitchen has stainless steel appliances including a 4 burner gas cook top, electric oven, dishwasher completed with a stylish glass red splash back. Modern central bathroom with a fantastic deep bath to relax & unwind in. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes & brand new carpet. Freshly painted throughout, only a few months old hot water service & recently serviced gas ducted heating are additional features. Outside is a single carport & garage, plenty of room to kick a footy or entertain your guests on the deck. With everything Clifton Springs has to offer the golf course, bay, boat ramps, beaches, new shops, medical facilities, schools & public transport too. All your wish boxes have been ticked.
Insights: 111 Country Club Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2018 and 109 other 3 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
